name: Ashurah
description:
Ashurah is beat em up based on the popular 90’s game ‘Golden Axe’. However, unlike many beat em up’s Ashurah allows you to switch between three characters, each with unique attacks and ultimate abilities called ‘Awakenings. 

The game takes place in a world inspired by the ancient near east with its design inspired by a variety of ancient cultures and mythologies from Babylonian and Assyrian. 

The player should feel challenged by an intense level of difficultly like darks souls with fast paced combat that it designed to have the player constantly thinking of how to adapt to the current situation by switching character and using each character’s ability affectively.
